column1: Pattoki (Urdu: پتّوكى‎) is a city in the Kasur District of the Punjab province of Pakistan. It is the headquarters of Pattoki Tehsil
column2: an administrative subdivision of Kasur District.

column1: Famous personalities of Pattoki include Mr. Arif Nakayi who was ex- chief minister Punjab and Muhammad Shahid Nazir
column2: also known as the One Pound Fish Man.

column1: Pattoki lies on the N-5 National Highway about 80 kilometres (50 mi) away from Lahore
column2: the capital of Punjab Province. It is an important railway station between the Okara District and Lahore.
